content.detailedDescription: I was out side in the back of my house north las vegas nv, it was about 7 pm the sun just went down over a mountain ,and at that moment i ,noticed what looked like a huge pyramid structure,and it was backlit buy the sun,and there was gas coming out of the sides,and right on the corner,you could see a yellow light , was able to take three pics from a apple 7 phone ,it disappeared after only 1-2 mins, all i really can say is i usual would not have noticed regular looking clouds,what i saw was very unnatural,check out the pics
content.summary: Could see nothing there ,the sun went down over the mountain,the in the back light a huge triangle,with gas coming out of the pyramids sides ran all around the corners,with and yellow light right on the corner, took three pics of the object

content.detailedDescription: While working at moffett field nasa ames research. during construction, we have numerous aircraft we observe. today i saw a typical commercial aircraft heading towards oakland . i notice the round oval shape object in a very close profile following the commercial craft. approximately 500 ft behind. it veered to the right heading towards moffett field very slowly. silver flashes  as if it was rolling but looked as if it would just flash light a mirror or a bright light. it travels slowly to the east, seemed to stop a few times and then continue its path. other people saw it but could not explain what they were looking at. i knew what it was.
content.summary: Working at moffett field. notice flashing object following commercial aircraft, then cross from west to east slowly

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to get something from my car. i looked up and it looked as if the moon was about to land on my house it was so big and so low, there is no way it could have been the moon.I ran inside to get two of my friends to come out and look, they also said,"i don't know what that is, but it ain't the moon. it started to go higher into the sky and to the right of my back porch, i started to video, what looked like the moon. i went back into the house too look at the video and saw strange lights that appear to be blinking in sequence around a round object on the left side of what appeared to be the moon, but the moon don't move with you standing there looking at it. so it wasn't the moon
content.summary: Video from cell phone online my house

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking pictures last weekend with a canon t1i (with a 55-250mm zoom lens) when i noticed a passenger jet flying by. 

the sky was blue, and the next was the only thing in the sky, so i snapped two pictures.

it was too far away to see any sort of detail but i took tow pictures (mainly because i use my camera in manual mode and like to work out settings such as iso, aperture and shutter speed on my own. 

i also tend to take picture in raw format, which posses more visual information than a jpg. 

in any case, when i zoomed into the photo–to get a better look at the jet–i noticed an object that appears metallic in priximity to the plane. 

i should mention that i have no way to tell their approximate positions relative to each other, but it clearly looked metallic (in fact, more metallic than the picture of the plane). 

i have no idea want it is, though what i do know is that it isn't a smudge on the lens (i have been using the camera regularly from a week or two, and occasionally clean it) and unlikely to be some sort of photographic artifact (then again, it is really ’small‘ relatively speaking. 

if this photo is used for any purpose i would appreciate being credited for it (the picture shops have metadata, which will tell you the date and time it was taken).
content.summary: I was taking pictures of a jet when is notices it wasn!T alone in the frame

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to the store and the sky looked strange and hazy, and looked like a hologram or a see through, mirage type thing crossing in front of my truck so i quickly took a picture with my cell phone. when i got back home i looked at the picture and to me it looks like some type of alien in the air about 30 feet in front of my truck and about 20 feet high.
content.summary: They sky looked strange so i took a picture while driving down the road and it looks like an alien on a hover type board

content.detailedDescription: I walked from the farm house to my jeep in the courtyard and thought it was unusually bright in the yard.  i opened the jeep door and the light went out.  i turned and looked up and there was a glowing orb directly above the house and at the same height as the tree line.  it beamed a light and it hit me in the head.  i just kept looking at it.  it started to descend toward me and i heard a helicopter.  instead it rose up above the barn and i grabbed my 7 x 50 nikon binoculars and zoomed right in on it as it arched up.  is was just a big ball of light.  and then it turned over my open land toward jordan lake and the helicopter came into view and went right for the orb and they both disappeared. over the tree line.  the helicopter had a red and green light and was otherwise dark, but not silent. on sunday morning oct 1, i received a call from my neighbor behind the treeline- 2 acres away who reported to me by phone that a "drone" was operating over my property, right over the farm house, on saturday night between 10 and midnight.  i was not there.  the trail cam was tripped at 11:11 pm and took numerous photos of the house.  i have set up the trailcam now to face the top of the house and fully expect it to return. now- i have researched this and it may be a military exercise called dark dart where by helicopters try to find drones.  the roof of the farmhouse was recently painted and is reflective aluminum and it was my impression it was hiding from infrared.  also i perceived the orb itself to have a very specific type of glow, it was not alien to me, and seemed chemical in nature.  it was very close to me and i had the binoculars and was able to zoom right in and observe it fly up and down and then arch.
content.summary: Large glowing orb directly above farm house.  i witnessed from less than 70 feet. chased by helicopter. it returned saturday sept 30th and was witnessed by neighbors.

content.detailedDescription: on october 4th 2017 at 6:12 am in chester field county virginia, i was leaving my house to head to work. it was still dark outside since the sun hadn't risen yet. i looked across the street at the school while walking to my car and i saw and object hovering in the sky. it had two main lights on either side and a few between the two that were flickering different colors. i then turned around and looked above my house toward my backyard and saw another craft looking exact to the first one. both just hovering. i then took out my phone and attempted to take a video but didn't have that great of a video because of the camera. i put the phone away and kept watching them, the first one by the school began to come toward my house at the same elevation and as that one moved the other began to move away and change direction to the right of my home and i lost sight. i watched the first ufo pass over my home and i could see the underbelly, it was lit up and i could only see that it was shaped like a cigar almost and it had no sound what so ever. i then ran to my car and because i not only had to go to work but i was also frightened. i edited and slowed down the video i took so you can get a better look it is only of the first ufo because i couldn't get my camera to focus on the second.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Two ufo's outside house near school

content.detailedDescription:
1-every day when i come home from work, i step into the house if my friend before to combine to run.
as usual i always pick up my cell phone and keep moving while my friend dresses up to go run.
while i waited for him, i was outside the house. i decided to take a picture of the moon, because it was very beautiful.
2-after the night the same day, i decided to look at my pictures on my cell phone. i looked at the photo of the moon i had taken and zoomed in on the street, as i dragged the screen to the side, i saw something different in the photo.
3-ufo (i believe, and i have other image that i will send to you too)
4- i saw after that event. ( see answer question 3 )
5- after i saw that it was an unidentified object, i became euphoric. and i wanted to show everyone who believes.
6-i only saw after the photo in my house the night
content.summary: I clicked on the moon

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside at work having a smoke then i noticed 3 white glowing objects two of them were right behind each other the other one was slightly off not directly behind the other two seen them for about 4 seconds then they disappeared into the clouds
content.summary: It was a quick sighting

content.detailedDescription: I would place this sighting at approximately 1999-2000, based on the location i was living at the time. i arrived home to my apartment complex at about 9 pm. as i exited my car, i heard a loud airplane droning noise. i was immediately curious, because that summer there were incidents where you would hear loud airplane noises during the day that would go on for a long time, but you would look in the sky and see nothing. on this occasion it was night time. i looked up in the sky and a large military seeming plane flew directly overhead flying due west. i watched the plane fly to the west, then turn south, then turn and head back east in my direction. the more interesting thing was now there was a ufo flying in front of it. i would say the ufo consisted of about 5 or 6 red lights which had a laser pen like quality. these lights were connected by lines of the same quality. but the odd thing was that these lights constantly moved in and out, changing and morphing their shape. it was like watching a laser light show flying through the air. this randomly changing light configuration flew by on my left not farther than a city block in distance from me. when it got to about parallel with my location, it changed direction and flew off to the northeast. i've search the internet and haven't found a report of a ufo of this type. i'd love to know if anyone has seem something similar.
content.summary: Aerial light display similar to a lazer light show

content.detailedDescription:
Estudantes saindo da faculdade observaram o objeto.
alguns funcionários do cemitério na mesma rua também viram.

content.detailedDescription: Walking towards beach area and owners office,people were looking up to the night sky, ufo out of this world, very quiet, still ,hovering over office 200 ft up! police were checking out ufo also scared,  hovering, glowing 3 red power bals underneath craft, 3 smaller craft in front of larger craft, glowing yellow lights underneath them, then moving towards hiens ketchup pannincilla, we even went out by boat to see and were chased back by smaller craft , we beached the speed boat, 2nd night another type of craft other section of bay !    3 beams of light came into our trailer, i saw approx. 10 4 ft hieght biengs looking for something they were in black space looking suites,   i was couruios , excited , i feel we were visted in our trailer by biengs, we were passed out for 3 hours then came to.  they objects went up quickly, blink of an eye !    i am bieng honest on all and can explain more and if some one dropped by i could bring them to witnesses , respectfully john werner  hte local police are covering up this incident, everytime i call they get mad,  i wish i had a camera it would of been the best ufo film ever
content.summary: Police&site people approx 40 ,police followed objects from wolfbourgh ,to lanes end  melvin village chief almost swallowed his cigar looking at ufos  2 days of sitings , mother , me , brother & sister   tornado happened  a day after sites, owner of park

content.detailedDescription: It was at around 3:25 in the morning heading back home from a casino. i was in the pasamferr seat and my fiancée was driving and we were listening to some music and i was singing. so while i was singing i'm looking at the sky and it's still dark outside so i'm looking up and i just see three red lights that formed a triangle and i was about to tell my fiancée look it's a jet but it was moving too slow so i didn't even get to tell him anything until it disappeared that's when i said "it's a ufo". and after that i didn't see it anymore in the sky..Honestly i felt so amazed that i had experienced that because i'm really into the ufos and aliens and things like that and seen it with my own eyes is something spectacular.
content.summary: Red lights that formed a triangle

content.summary: Watch my chicken and the drone where bent the light around body

content.detailedDescription:
I was having a cigarette on my balcony looking west towards the airport. (zurich) i noticed a bright gold/ orange light through the trees. i watched it for a few minutes and it continued to rise quite fast (seemed faster than a plane) coming towards my direction. as i was watching, it got brighter when it appeared above my neighbours roof as it moved to my right, it dimmed slightly when it was approximately over the hardwald forest ma shooting star came over from my right in the direction of the bright sphere but burned out before it reached the same area. the bright orb seemed to slow down or gained altitude as it lost brightness then disappeared just north of where i was standing. within 15 minutes a helicopter shows up heading towards the forest and hovered for some 10 minutes before flying off towards the forest. 
i would not have reported this as i have seen the sphere before in a similar direction as described a couple of months back but all three sightings together made me suspicious.
disclaimer: i do live near the airport and there is a lot of air traffic. i am very used to seeing aircraft flying in and around and this was very different.
content.summary: Bright light frommwest direction north followed by shooting star and then helicopter

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a starlike object and it switched off to a bunch of lights horizontally, near one another, then would turn colors. it broke off into three and went back. 
     i also saw what appeared to be a shooting star heading towards it.
seconds later, i saw a round object moving slowly with dim dark orange bottom barely lit heading from south to north slowly making no sound.
     this lasted for about one hour and fifty minutes.

mr. donald gene willard
content.summary: I saw a total of five objects

content.detailedDescription:
i was sitting on the back patio having coffee at a friend's house at 6 am on october 3, 2017. i noticed in front of me, low in the sky what i thought must be a plane or star low in the sky. it was bright white with pronounced white lines surrounding it. much like a child would draw a christmas star. i looked around at the other stars to compare and none had this same look. there was also airline traffic far to the east so i could compare the red/blue/white colors to them as well. it then changed to three circles, orbs if you will, of blue then red but very close together. then it dramatically changed again into a bright white very defined triangle and back to the original star like shape. i cannot tell you how long this process took but not long. i was amazed at how crisp and defined the triangle was. when it was back to the "star" shape i noticed it dropping red lights, not orbs, looked like red lines for lack of better description. i was trying to comprehend what i was seeing and i really can't find the right words to describe the things it dropped. i have seen flares dropped from military helicopters and this wasn't even close. i grabbed my cell phone and recorded the object for a short time. i was mesmerized and honestly more interested in seeing it with my eyes and not through a phone. this allowed me to get more detail. it was stationary except when in the three colored circle phase then it seemed to move around. i guess it was in this phase when i recorded it because in the video (crummy, on iphone) it moves quite a bit. it very slowly moved while in star form towards me a bit and i noticed an arc of white light behind it. then it was stationary for some time repeating above process.
i grabbed my friend but she was getting ready for work so she only could see it for a moment. i watched it for probably 20 minutes until it moved west out of view because of trees. 
i had no explanation for what i was seeing. i wasn't afraid at all which surprised me. i can't explain it and it may sound odd but i had the feeling they were surveying. this is nothing but a strange, gut type feeling.
when i looked at the video which is hard to see unless you zoom in, i was surprised it looked a little different than what i saw in person. it looks like one blue orb with a white light inside and it dances around quite a bit. at the end when it appears to speed upward, that is just me lowering my phone. it was stationary.
content.summary: White starlike appearence. changed to blue then red circles. then to bright defined triangle. when moved left an arc or comet like tail. silent. very slowly made it's way west. dropped red lights, not quite orbs or circles.

content.detailedDescription: at least one of my friends at myself had snuck out of my backyard in the tent that we were sleeping to go fishing at 9 mile road and jefferson in st. clair shores michigan we were at the end of the pier fishing only saw the light we couldn't tell if it was in the water on the water above the water as it got closer we don't remember what happened but when we  when we regained our senses we were further towards the shore as this is a long pier and our bicycles and fishing equipment was still at the end of the pier and we had a memory of seeing a helicopter we never talked about it for 30 or more years until my friend said to me one night while we're sitting in my living room remember when we seen that light at the end of 9 mile road pier and we thought it was a helicopter do you remember seeing a helicopter and i said no he  said either do i that was the end of the conversationi   we were cold and scared when we regained our composure near the end of the pier 500 yards or more from where we were when we first saw the light and we have no recollection of what happened for at least three hours it was 3 o'clock in the morning when i saw the light it was 6 o'clock in the morning when we pick up our gear and left to go back home neither of us have any memory of a craft just the light bright white light that took ourmemory and we  have no idea how we got 500 yards away for sure on the same paier  cold shaking  no longer wanting to fish we went home i never told my parents because we weren't supposed to be sneaking out of the tent to go fishing at that time in the morning estimate we were 11 or 12 which would make it 19 69/68
content.summary: I self and at least one friend snuck out of my 10 in my parents backyard to go fishing at 9 mile road and jefferson where there's a long pier that jets out until like while fishing we saw a light coming towards us and that's the last thing we remember

content.detailedDescription: Was hunting genseng in the appalachian mountains were i live and just days before i had seen aan object similar to this one ,i was again checking to see where i was on my gps and again my phone wasn't working so i looked up thinking no way could the ufo i observed just days before be back because that's what happened the first the and saw a bright light,and noticed 2more dimmer lights on each side and they got brighter changing colors from white to red to blue all different colors and it seemed to be about a mile away and as it got further away my phone started working again so i decided to hurry and take pictures this time,i couldn't believe this has happened once to me but twice in such a short period of time has changed me and my perspective on everything forever,i will submit the pictures i took,thank you
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change

content.detailedDescription: I witnessed a ufo that looked like a star which appeared not to be in our atmosphere. the object was very slow and was glowing. it traveled from south to north then disappeared within my line of sight. i noticed the 2nd ufo after the 1st ufo. it was traveling from south west to north east. it looked like the first ufo i observed. however, after about 2 minutes it flashed and disappeared. this is the 2nd time i have witnessed something like this over my town within 2 months. the 1st time i was with someone else who observed it at the same time as i did.
content.summary: 1 traveled for about 3 minutes then disappeared. other ufo traveled about 2 minutes then flashed and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
It was the night of september 23, 2017 about 8:45 pm. we were waiting for the impending fountain extravaganza at longwood gardens in the town of kennett square, pennsylvania which begins at 9:30 pm.

we were all lying on blankets on our backs waiting for the show to begin when i saw out of the corner of my eye what looked like a meteorite. i announced it to the other 3 people who were there and then started looking for more possible meteorites. what i saw immediately ended up looking very strange. there were about 8 moving lights in the sky, all darting or zig-zagging back and forth. they would move across the heavens, fade out, and then some would re-appear in a few minutes in ones and twos, each time shooting across the sky in different directions and speeds, some red, some white. they looked like meteorites except they definitely weren't because they lingered for 10-15 seconds, traveled at varying speeds and went in all different directions. they could be distinguished from planes which were just bright lights moving steadily across the sky and stars which were fixed points of light. it was a cloudless night and these were evidently very high up. all four of us saw the same lights at the same time. this kept happening for about a half hour or until the fountain show began.

i called longwood gardens and asked them whether they utilized any laser lights for their show. they said no. i went online to see whether there were any reports of ufo sightings in the same vicinity. again, nothing.

we are mystified by this occurrence and have no plausible explanation for what we all saw.
content.summary: Multiple lights very high up darting back and forth. they would fade out and re-appear. some would move fast others slower

content.detailedDescription: I was heading south and saw 4 lights in chevron formation hovering around eachother, changing positions. light on far right zoomed west. remaining 3 danced around each other, ended in chevron formation and proceeded south.  the lights rapidly faded to nothing. no sound.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw 4 lights in south sky. one zoomed west, others hovered around each other ended in chevron formation they headed south till faded into nothing.

content.detailedDescription: Saw a saucer like metallic thing hovering at the tree tops in a bird sanctuary behind my apartment. every time i zoomed in very close with the camera my camera would not focus. it stayed there about an hour and disappeared while i was doing other things. managed to take one photo.
content.summary: Noticed metallic saucer type thing hovering in the trees. have picture

content.detailedDescription: I need to discuss with investigator in person.  too many items to list. i've been taking video and pictures lately and strange objects and entities are showing up.  one in particular is my drive home from work at night.. the photos are timed stamped and show two lights hovering and what appears to be to entities on top of the lights..Then my screen goes black.  now it could be a trick w/ the camera itself but other strange things are happening around me and outside my home.
content.summary: I captured recent activity on smart phone live photos and video
